p: Here is an article I know you'll be thrilled to read, since Dad & all of us have from it received our first knowledge of just how the Germans pulled the Norway stunt. The article starts on other side. Please save this, Dad says.
We are all well & happy & send loads of love to you & Joan & Elaine.
Will write you more later. Mrs. Boyles says I'm about ready for some 'luck'.

Alice came hoem tonite all tickled over a fine Master lesson she & others had with Jose Fermandez, the famous Spanish dancer who appeared at the Municipal auditorium last nite. He spent 2 hrs. with Al & others at MME Cassume's
